DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Oral Miltefosine in Patients With Post Kala Azar Dermal Leishmaniasis (PKDL)
DOC.criteria: 12 years or older nodules and papules consistent with post kalaazar dermal leishmaniasis parasitological confirmation of Leishmania infection platelet count <100x 109/l, leukocyte count <2.5 x 109/l , hemoglobin < 8.0 g/100 ml , liver function tests >3 times upper limit of normal range, bilirubin >2 times upper limit of normal range, serum creatinine or blood urea nitrogen >1.5 times upper limit of normal range); any noncompensated or uncontrolled condition, lactation, pregnancy, or likelihood of inadequate contraception in females of childbearing potential for the treatment period plus 2 months thereafter; treatment with any antileishmanial drug within the previous 12 weeks.
